Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class Omiscid::MutexedSimpleList< TYPE >

Combination of a simple list with a mutex.

The mutex is used to lock and unlock the access to the simple list. When the user want to lock an access, he can call Lock and Unlock method.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz

template<typename TYPE>
bool Omiscid::MutexedSimpleList< TYPE >::Unlock (  )  [inline, virtual]

Unlock the access to the list.

if the 'unlock' on the mutex is successful
